registry.title: Sunshine Mountain Lodge
registry.description: The only "ski in ski out" resort in Banff. We will be staying for 5 nights indulging in plenty of skiing during the day and will be either relaxing in our Deluxe Waterfall room after a hard day's shift on the slopes or in the jacuzzi!

registry.title: Mount Royal Hotel
registry.description: This is in fact our first point of call! After a grueling 12+ hours travel time, we will stay here for 9 nights and use it as a base whilst we ski and find many adventures in the Canadian Rockies.

registry.title: Ski equipment and passes
registry.description: We don't own ski's nor the slopes are free! Therefore we will be hiring equipment and paying for various passes to enable us to access Banff's ski slopes Sunshine, Lake Louise & Norquay.

registry.title: Great Divide Dogsled Tour
registry.description: Another adventure which will make great memories. This is a 1.5hr dog sledging tour along the Continental Divide in Lake Louise and we travel approximately 16km.

registry.title: Johnson Canyon Ice Walk
registry.description: We love walking and this tour allows us to explore ice-covered waterfalls and beautiful scenery of Johnson Canyon in Banff. This is a half-day tour which will take us through to the upper falls which is a 30m high waterfall (hopefully frozen).

registry.title: Banff Upper Hot Springs
registry.description: After a hard days skiing on the slopes, what is better than taking some time out and soaking in the steaming hot springs in Banff to relax our muscles.

registry.title: Afternoon Tea
registry.description: Sally loves an afternoon tea but this is located within the Fairmont Chateau overlooking the specular views of ice covered Lake Louise.

registry.title: Calgary
registry.description: We finish up our honeymoon in Calgary. We will spend time relaxing, shopping and visiting many of the local attractions such as the Wonderland Sculpture, Calgary Tower & the Historic Village.
